attributes.action: Impose legal limits on alcohol content of beverages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increasing the price of alcoholic beverages is unlikely to reduce consumption or reduce binge drinking and its associated unsociable behaviour.

Lowering the alcohol content of beers and lagers, say, from 5% to 4% would be more effective. The amount should be limited by law.
